item.title: 卢比跌至历史新低，美元走强影响情绪
item.description: 由于美元走强打压了地区情绪，印度卢比跌至历史新低。【原文：The Indian rupee fell to a record low as a stronger dollar weighed on regional sentiment.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: 春节后中国航空旅行人数再创新高
item.description: 在政府努力促进国家旅游业发展和国内度假需求强劲的背景下，中国各航空公司第一季度的飞行人数创下了历史新高。【原文：China’s airlines flew a record number of people in the first quarter, amid government efforts to boost the nation’s tourism sector and strong demand for holidays at home.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为美联储推迟减息将推后亚洲的宽松政策
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的经济学家认为，随着美联储推迟放宽政策，亚洲大多数央行都可能在今年晚些时候开始降息。【原文：Most central banks across Asia are likely to begin cutting interest rates later in the year — if at all, according to economists at Morgan Stanley, as the Federal Reserve delays its own policy easing.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机袭击俄罗斯对原油出口的影响
item.description: 乌克兰最近对俄罗斯炼油厂发动的一系列无人机袭击在分析师和交易商中引发了一个问题：这是否会导致莫斯科将炼油厂无法加工的大量原油转移到全球市场？【原文：Ukraine’s recent spate of drone attacks on oil refineries in Russia have led to a question among analysts and traders: will it result in Moscow diverting large amounts of crude — that the plants are unable to process — into the global market place?】

item.title: 中国在塑料行业日益增长的主导地位正在挤垮亚洲竞争对手
item.description: 中国石化工业的迅速发展，使亚洲第二大塑料生产原料出口国的生产商的日子越来越难过。【原文：China’s rapidly expanding petrochemicals industry is making life increasingly difficult for producers in Asia’s next-biggest exporter of the building blocks for making plastics.】

item.title: 即使干预风险上升，日元交易员仍为 160 日元水平做好准备
item.description: 日元暴跌正促使交易员们盘算，即使干预的阴影迫在眉睫，陷入困境的日本货币还能跌多少。【原文：A tumbling yen is spurring traders to game plan how much further Japan’s beleaguered currency can fall even with the specter of intervention looming.】

item.title: 贝莱德总裁认为市场有望卷土重来
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s co-founder sees markets primed for a comeback.】

item.title: 印尼盾跌破 16000 点后印尼央行出手干预
item.description: 在印尼盾四年来首次跌破1美元兑16000印尼盾后，印尼银行出手支持印尼盾。【原文：Bank Indonesia stepped in to support the rupiah after the currency weakened past 16,000 per dollar for the first time in four years.】

item.title: 美元走强的赌注在期权市场上越来越昂贵
item.description: 由于美国经济的韧性推动了对美元的需求，期权市场上押注美元进一步上涨的成本升至 11 月以来的最高点。【原文：The cost of betting on further dollar gains in the options market rose to the highest since November as the US economy’s resilience drives demand for the currency.】

item.title: 在工业驱动下，中国出人意料地实现强劲增长
item.description: 中国第一季度的经济增长超出预期，工厂产出带动了经济扩张，这增强了人们对中国政府能够实现其雄心勃勃的年度目标的预期。【原文：China’s economic growth beat expectations in the first quarter, as factory output led the expansion bolstering expectations the government can hit its ambitious annual target.】

item.title: 中国房价下跌，低迷态势几无缓解迹象
item.description: 3 月份，中国房价继续下跌，给政府加大力度支持陷入困境的房地产市场增加了压力。【原文：China’s home prices continued to fall in March, adding pressure on authorities to step up efforts to support the embattled real estate market.】

item.title: 科塔克认为印度指数的纳入改善了银行的流动性
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.）预计，摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. expects the addition of the country’s sovereign bonds to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s global indexes from June to boost banks’ liquidity and reduce the need to aggressively pursue deposits in the short term.】

item.title: 伊朗袭击以色列后新兴市场货币跌至 2024 年低点
item.description: 新兴市场货币跌至年内新低，原因是地缘政治紧张局势加剧，以及强劲的美国数据推高了美联储将推迟降息的押注，美元连续第五天扩大涨幅。【原文：Emerging-market currencies fell to a new low for the year as the dollar extended gains into a fifth day amid heightened geopolitical tensions and after robust US data boosted bets the Federal Reserve will delay interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 美元走强，中国放宽对人民币的汇率限制
item.description: 中国出人意料地削弱了对人民币的防御，因为美元回升的压力和低迷的情绪迫使中国迈向政策红线。【原文：China unexpectedly weakened its yuan defense as pressure from a resurgent dollar and poor sentiment pressured it toward a policy red line.】

item.title: 阿波罗的泽尔特向澳大利亚大型基金大谈私人信贷
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.联席总裁詹姆斯-泽尔特（James Zelter）说，金融市场正在经历一场 "巨大的转型"，越来越多的公司开始寻求私人信贷方案，而不是从银行融资。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. Co-President James Zelter said financial markets are undergoing a “massive transition,” where companies are increasing looking at private credit options rather than financing from banks.】

item.title: 黄金稳定在历史高位附近，避险需求推动涨势
item.description: 由于伊朗对以色列的打击进一步推动了黄金的涨势，黄金自二月中旬以来已飙升了五分之一，周一黄金在纪录高点附近企稳。【原文：Gold steadied near a record high, after surging on Monday as Iran’s strike on Israel added more impetus to a rally that’s seen it jump by a fifth since mid-February.】

item.title: 日本财务大臣在国际货币基金组织-七国集团会议前对日元发出警告
item.description: 在日元兑美元汇率一夜之间飙升至 34 年新低之后，日本财务大臣警告说，他已准备好在必要时在外汇市场上采取一切可用措施。【原文：Japan’s finance minister warned that he’s ready to take all available measures in the foreign exchange market if needed after the yen surged to a new 34-year low against the dollar overnight.】

item.title: Codelco 希望建立合作伙伴关系，帮助提高濒临破产的铜产量
item.description: 智利国营铜业巨头 Codelco 公司正在探索与私营部门建立更多的合作伙伴关系，以期从产量下滑和债务激增的困境中恢复过来。【原文：Codelco is exploring more partnerships with the private sector as Chile’s state copper behemoth looks to recover from a production slump and surging debt.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。中东局势紧张。美股跌破关键门槛。欧盟调查中国医疗器械采购。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. Tensions simmer in the Middle East. US stocks fall below key threshold. EU probes China's procurement of medical devices. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 以色列应对伊朗的前景加剧紧张局势，石油上涨
item.description: 以色列誓言对伊朗发动的前所未有的袭击作出回应，使中东局势持续紧张，石油因此上涨。【原文：Oil gained as Israel vowed to respond to an unprecedented attack by Iran, keeping tensions elevated in the Middle East.】

item.title: 以下 29 种股票与印度大选结果密切相关
item.description: 随着印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）寻求第三次连任，印度投资者将密切关注本周启动的全国民意调查，以寻找涨幅居前股票的线索。【原文：Investors in India will closely track national polls kicking off this week for clues on top stock gainers as Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeks a third term.】

item.title: 公司债券销售枯竭，越南再融资风险加剧
item.description: 随着收益率上升和政府加强对资本市场的审查，越南企业正在减少发行新债券，这一事态发展引发了对再融资风险的担忧。【原文：Vietnamese companies are cutting back on issuing new bonds as yields rise and the government heightens scrutiny on capital markets, a development that’s stirring refinancing risk concerns.】

item.title: 悉尼赌场调查
item.description: 早上好，我是悉尼的乔吉。今日必读：- 明星高管密谋反对政府经理- 麦格理考虑设立新的债务基金- 新西兰通胀放缓【原文：Good morning, it’s Georgie here in Sydney. Here’s what you need to know today.Today’s must-reads:• Star executives plotted against government manager• Macquarie mulls fresh debt fund• New Zealand inflation to slow】

item.title: 华尔街科技股暴跌后亚洲股市将下跌：市场综述
item.description: 美国通胀顽固的最新证据刺激了美联储不急于降息的赌注，亚洲股市准备跟随华尔街股市走低。【原文：Asian stocks were poised to follow Wall Street shares lower after the latest evidence of stubborn US inflation spurred bets the Federal Reserve will be in no rush to cut rates.】

item.title: 东京房地产隐藏的数十亿美元吸引激进对冲基金
item.description: 东京最大摩天大楼隐藏已久的市场价值正由激进投资者揭开面纱。【原文：The long-concealed market value of Tokyo’s largest skyscrapers is being unveiled by activist investors.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚监管机构为委内瑞拉天然气进口铺平道路
item.description: 哥伦比亚将允许委内瑞拉国家石油公司的天然气部门在其境内运营，为从邻国进口燃料铺平道路。【原文：Colombia will allow a natural gas unit of Venezuela’s state oil company to operate in its territory, paving the way for fuel imports from its neighbor.】

item.title: Gildan 新任首席执行官回应激进分子试图罢免他的言论
item.description: Gildan Activewear Inc.首席执行官文斯-泰拉（Vince Tyra）表示，他将在未来五年内提高这家加拿大服装制造商的利润，他的计划包括重振 American Apparel 品牌和深入拓展海外市场。【原文：In response to an activist shareholder’s push to oust him, Gildan Activewear Inc. Chief Executive Officer Vince Tyra said he’ll boost the Canadian clothing manufacturer’s profit over the next five years with a plan that includes reviving the American Apparel brand and expanding deeper into overseas markets.】

item.title: T.T Rowe Price称日元兑美元有下跌10%的风险
item.description: T. Rowe Price Group Inc.全球固定收益投资组合经理昆汀-菲茨西蒙斯（Quentin Fitzsimmons）认为，由于日本央行不愿大幅加息，日元将继续下跌，并可能再跌10%，跌至20世纪80年代以来的水平。【原文：The Japanese yen will continue its drop and could slide another 10% to levels not seen since the 1980s because of the Bank of Japan’s reluctance to raise interest rates significantly, according to Quentin Fitzsimmons, a global fixed-income portfolio manager for T. Rowe Price Group Inc.】

item.title: 创纪录的债券销售热潮为高盛、花旗和摩根大通带来丰厚利润
item.description: 随着美国公司以创纪录的速度出售债务，银行的盈利也从承销费中得到了提升。【原文：Banks are getting an earnings boost from underwriting fees as companies sell debt in the US at a record pace.】
